query: query {  rushingStats(    pagedSelection: {      selection: {        requestedPlayers: ["A Player"],        maybeSortBy : {sortField: LNG, sortOrder: DESC}      },       page: {        index: 0,        size: 5      }    }) {    player,    team,    pos,    att,    att_G,    yds,    avg,    yds_G    td,    lng,    rushingFirstDowns,    rushingFirstDownPercentage,    twentyPlus,    fortyPlus,    fum  }}
